channel.title: Shopkeeper wont trade me
channel.description:
Ok, here's the problem
When i try to trade a shopkeeper i spawned, they wont trade me
Now, i copied the shop code, autospawn code, and client.java code directly from a source that HAS working shops, but it still didnt work, heres what my runserver box displays when i hit trade on him
[code] 442 442 442 442 [/code]
It repeats that number as many times as i trade him.
Now, i know that all my codes are correct, heres what my autospawn, shops.cgf, and client.java looks like
Client.java [code] if (NPCID == 546) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; } else if (NPCID == 554) { //Gilded Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 48; //Gilded Shop [/code]
[code] //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 410 2965 3385 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mysterious Old Man spawn = 554 2963 3387 0 0 0 0 0 1 Something [/code] The 554 is the gilded shop NPC that i spawned
[code]  //-----ShopID---ShopName------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item Shop = 48 Gilded Shop 2 2 348 100 [/code]

item.title: Shopkeeper wont trade me
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

wannashop = 6;
But i see November 12 anyway maybe you still see it
